latexmkPath.title: Path to latexmk
latexmkPath.description: Path to the latexmk executable. Leave as 'latexmk' if it's in your PATH.

latexEngine.title: LaTeX Engine
latexEngine.description: The LaTeX engine to use for compilation.

enum.description: XeLaTeX - Unicode and system fonts support
LuaLaTeX - Lua scripting and Unicode support

enableSynctex.title: Enable SyncTeX
enableSynctex.description: Enable SyncTeX for forward and backward search between source and PDF. Required for synctex features.

synctexPath.title: Path to SyncTeX
synctexPath.description: Path to the synctex executable. Used for forward and backward search between source and PDF.

shellEscape.title: Enable shell escape
shellEscape.description: Enable shell escape (-shell-escape) for packages that need to execute external commands. WARNING: Only enable for trusted documents.

outputVerbosity.title: Output Verbosity
outputVerbosity.description: Control the amount of output from latexmk during compilation.

enum.description: Extended - Show errors, warnings, and info

cleanAuxFiles.title: Clean auxiliary files after build
cleanAuxFiles.description: Remove auxiliary files (.aux, .log, .out, etc.) after successful compilation.

cleanExtensions.title: Clean patterns
cleanExtensions.description: List of file extensions to remove when cleaning (comma-separated, without dots). Used by the clean command.

debug.title: Debug Mode
debug.description: Enable debug messages in the developer console.
